channel.title: Travel on Dan Aukes
channel.description: Recent content in Travel on Dan Aukes

item.title: Split, Croatia
item.description: Saturday, July 22 I woke at 5am, and, looking out the porthole, saw land!

item.title: San Marino
item.description: Thursday, July 20 We drove across the country to San Marino.

item.title: Pisa, Italy
item.description: Wednesday, July 19 We got off the ferry from Corsica and found a taxi-van right away.

item.title: Corsica
item.description: Friday, July 14, 2023 Walking across the piazza on our way to the Genoa train station Sweaty at the Genoa train station waiting for the train.

item.title: Genoa, Italy
item.description: Monday July 10th Our bags before we headed out The train car we picked Reward for an intense travel day: Gelato Ben and Dad out to dinner.

item.title: Nice, France
item.description: Friday, July 7 Kids can sleep anywhere&hellip; Kids can sleep anywhere&hellip; &hellip;But mom didn&rsquo;t sleep much at all.

item.title: Pre-Trip to Minnesota
item.description: Monday June 26th flying to MN flying to MN flying to MN Headed to Minneapolis from Phoenix with Dan, Ben, Sam, and Max.
